potion-warning.title: Potion Warning Config
potion-warning.option.warn-time: Choose when you get warned (in ticks)
potion-warning.option.textScale.tooltip: Change the size of the text in %
potion-warning.option.textPosX.tooltip: Change the text position around the x axis
potion-warning.option.textPosY.tooltip: Change the text position around the y axis
potion-warning.option.centeredText.toolt: Make the text centered around its position
